question: ny 2 eldest teen daughters are type1, as is their father. daughter #3 has vitiligo, should she be screened for diabetes?  lately she c/o fatigue and post prandial fullness several hours after meals. last fasting blood sugar was 105.  What tests are commonly used as predictors besides accucheks and a1c?  oh, she also has canker sores pretty frequently. I appreciate any input,thanks. jbs
title: screening tests for sibling of type 1 diabetes.
